KAKENHI meeting FY2023

KAKENHI meeting on September 14th - 15th in AIST Tokyo Waterfront Annex building, Tokyo

The 1st FY2023 Meeting of KAKENHI Kiban-A Project: “Robust AI by Integration of Knowledge Representation and Machine Learning”.

Support: JSPS KAKENHI Grant No. JP21H04905 Kiban-A

Date: September 14-15, 2023 (JST)

Venue: AIST Tokyo Waterfront Annex building, Tokyo
